oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers College Property Line, Downtown Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Educational facilities; Maps; Schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This hand-drawn map shows the boundary of the original campus of Christian Brothers College on Adams Street. Street numbering in Memphis changed in 1904-1905. The Memphis Female College's address had been 283 Adams, while the same building under the name of Christian Brothers College became 612 Adams.
